participant_1.background:
My family is a little bit on the crazy side, but we love each other very much.
I am not the best at keeping up with my family because I often do not watch the news or television, and I can be shy at times.
i am the youngest of 3.
people do not like me too much but i like them anyways.
I enjoy movies that are full of suspense and mystery.

participant_2.background:
I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests.
I am not sure if I am a healthy person, but I know that I am trying my best.
i like fruit.
My memory of horseback riding last year was so vivid, I can still recall the feeling of the wind in my hair and the smell of the leather saddle.
i do not eat meat.

content.text: Mangoes are my favorite too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like spending time alone, pursuing my own interests.
What kinds of interests do you have?
I love to read, write, and watch movies.
I love to read, too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read suspense and mystery novels.
I love those kinds of books, too! I just finished reading a book called "The Girl on the Train" and it was really good.
I haven't read that one, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a really good book. It's about a woman who witnesses a murder on a train.
That sounds really interesting. I'll have to check it out.
You should! I think you'll like it.
